Satellites and variables

  • - Sentinel 2 MultiSpectral Instrument (MSI)
  • - Sentinel 3
pyeogpr
  • - Sentinel 2 MultiSpectral Instrument (MSI)
  • View page source

This package currently features the following satellite sensors and biophysical variables for mapping:

- Sentinel 2 MultiSpectral Instrument (MSI)

  • Top of atmosphere: Level 1C (SENTINEL2_L1C)

    Leaf variables:

    • Cab: Leaf chlorophyll content [μg/cm]

    • Cm: Leaf dry matter content [g/cm$^2$]

    • Cw: Leaf water content [g/cm$^2$]

    Canopy variables

    • FVC: Fractional Vegetation Cover [-]

    • LAI: Leaf Area Index [m$^2$/m$^2$]

    • laiCab Canopy chlorophyll content [g/m$^2$]

    • laiCm: Leaf dry matter content [g/m$^2$]

    • laiCw Canopy water content [g/m$^2$]

  • Bottom of atmosphere: Level 2A

    Leaf variables (no uncertainties)

    • Cab: Leaf chlorophyll content [μg/cm]

    • Cm: Leaf dry matter content [g/cm$^2$]

    • Cw: Leaf water content [g/cm$^2$]

    Canopy variables

    • CNC_Cab: Canopy Nitrogen Content (via chlorophyl-nitrogen relationship) [g/m$^2$]

    • CNC_Cprot: Canopy Nitrogen Content (via protein content relationship) [g/m$^2$]

    • FVC: Fractional Vegetation Cover [-]

    • LAI: Leaf Area Index [m$^2$/m$^2$]

    • laiCab Canopy chlorophyll content [g/m$^2$]

    • laiCm: Leaf dry matter content [g/m$^2$]

    • laiCw Canopy water content [g/m$^2$]

    Mangrove traits

    • mangrove_LAI: Leaf Area Index [m$^2$/m$^2$]

    • mangrove_Cm: Leaf Dry Matter [g/cm$^2$]

    • mangrove_Cw: Leaf Water thickness [g/cm$^2$]

    • mangrove_Cab: Leaf Chlorophyll Content [g/μm$^2$]

- Sentinel 3

  • Top of atmosphere (OLCI): Level 1B

    • FAPAR: Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation

    • FVC Fractional Vegetation Cover

    • LAI: Leaf Area Index

    • LCC Leaf Chlorophyll Content

  • SYNERGY (OLCI and SLSTR): Level 2A

    Currently only on openEO back-ends!

    • FAPAR: Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation

    • FVC Fractional Vegetation Cover
